Name: Lollo Campaign: Navigation II
Description: The Day 2 Campaign content has been updated to include new maintenance and navigation features. Test out the new functions and see how they enhance your experience!
QuestDesc: The Day 2 Campaign content has been updated to include new maintenance and navigation features. Test out the new functions and see how they enhance your experience!

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Detected: An item in need of repairs in the Lollo Warehouse vicinity. Timely repairs are advised...
Timely repairs are advised. Timely repairs are advised. Timely repairs are advised...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay, Okay. Stop, stop it already. Sheesh. Weird, I don't remember installing a repeat function for reminders...

Options.PlotLineKey: Looks like they've given it the new "Lollo Fixit" DLC.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here you are, {PlayerName}. Just a sec. I need to turn off this annoying reminder.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe. You're as sharp as a tack per usual, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Introducing, the new "Lollo Fixit." A fixer on the go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The live map now can not only record road conditions but also keep tabs on the status of equipment.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If the system fails to receive regular data reports from the equipment after a certain period of time, "Lollo Navigator" will log its map coordinates, and the duration shall reflect the likelihood of a malfunction.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you saw earlier, the Sound Emulator at the Lollo Warehouse hasn't reported back in a long time, likely due to a malfunction. I'll leave the repairs to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Finally, it's stopped repeating itself. Looks like your work is done over there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks for the hard work. Did you get today's payment? I might need your help again with improving the other features later.
